org.mozilla.gecko

Class GeckoEditable

  • Object
    • android.os.Binder
      • org.mozilla.gecko.IGeckoEditableParent.Stub
        • org.mozilla.gecko.GeckoEditable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.IBinder, android.os.IInterface, android.text.Editable, android.text.GetChars, android.text.Spannable, android.text.Spanned, Appendable, CharSequence, java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler, IGeckoEditableParent, TextInputController.EditableClient

    public final class GeckoEditable
extends IGeckoEditableParent.Stub
implements java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler, android.text.Editable, TextInputController.EditableClient
    GeckoEditable implements only some functions of Editable The field mText contains the actual underlying SpannableStringBuilder/Editable that contains our text.
